name: Light & Motion VIS 500 Combo Bike Light Set
description: Keep yourself seen on your daily commutes. Blaze the path home with this powerful headlight and a bright taillight combo. Both lights are USB rechargeable to keep them topped up and ready to ride.Vis 500 has 4 modes: high (1.5h at 500 lumens), medium (3h at 250 lumens), low (6h at 125 lumens) and SafePulse (12h at 125 lumens).Vya Switch has 3 modes: SafePulse high (6h at 100 lumens), SafePulse low (12h at 50 lumens) and steady (4h at 25 lumens).SafePulse mode offer improved rider visibility, without the negative side effects of flash modes.Tool-free mounting system attaches easily.Quick-release clicks on-and-off the mounting bracket.Textured reflector for powerful focused headlight beam.Vis 500 has amber peripheral lights for side visibility.IP67 waterproofing.Accurate battery status indicator.Auto-shut-off feature prevents damage.Both lights charge via USB.
